text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Trainer, are you feeling tired?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I know! Do you want me to share some 
of the things I recommend for relaxing?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Aromatics, herb teas, and bath bombs～ 
…… Ehehe, I have plenty of stuff～♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's important to take breaks everyday!
Because it's only natural that you'll
get tired while working or studying～
